text: hageye navu mad‌yan janangadavaredege avara sahodara su'aib‌rannu kaluhisidevu. Avaru helidaru; ‘‘nanna janangadavare, allahanannu matra pujisiri, avana horatu nimage bere devarilla. Idiga nim'ma balige nim'ma odeyana kadeyinda spasta puraveyu bandide. Nivinnu, paripurnavagi aleyiri mattu tugiri. Janarige avara sarakugalannu kaditagolisi kodabedi. Hageye, bhumiyalli sudharaneyada balika nivu adaralli asantiyannu habbabedi. Nivu nambuvavaragiddare, i dhoraneye nim'ma palige uttama.’’
